discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CD
C and D are correct.

choices.B: the arrows on a class diagram are always directed from a superclass towards its subclass
choices.D: inheritance is the relation between a superclass and a subclass
choices.A: an object is a recipe for a class
choices.C: encapsulation allows you to protect some data from uncontrolled access

A and B are corrects
